snippet.title: Carry The Glass - Steam Trailer (Out on 24th of October)
snippet.description:
Wishlist On Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3263320/Carry_The_Glass/

Team up as two quirky construction workers in this fun 2-player co-op platformer! 

Carry a fragile glass window through colorful levels filled with challenges. Communicate and coordinate to dodge obstacles and solve puzzles. 
Can you finish the job without breaking the glass?

#gamedev #coop #couplesgaming #steam #indiedev #games #upcominggames #multiplayer
